categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ellu Viss was a male Padawan in 130 ABY. Viss survived the Battle of Ossus, where the Padawan managed to recover Tionne Solusar's records, recorded nearly a century prior. Viss, using Solusar's records, recorded the Jedi Order's plight against the One Sith.
